participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

fitf_s1_q1_p.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your son/daughter's age, how much physical activity does your child engage in? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s2_q1_p.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your son/daughter's age, how many sedentary behaviors does your child engage in? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s3_q1_p.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your son/daughter's age, how much sleep does your child get? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s4_q2a_1_p.Description: Did you encourage your child to change his/her activity or sleep based on the information? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

fitf_s4_q2b_p.Description: Did your child use the app and/or website to see his/her Fitbit activity? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

fitf_s4_q2b_1_p.Description: Did he/she change his/her activity or sleep based on the information? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

fitf_s5_q2a_p.Description: What time was your child's 1st food/drink?

fitf_s5_q2ai_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q2b_p.Description: When was your child's last food/drink?

fitf_s5_q2bi_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q3a_p.Description: What time was your child's 1st food/drink?

fitf_s5_q3ai_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q3b_p.Description: What time was your child's last food/drink?

fitf_s5_q3bi_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q4_p.Description: Were any of the prior 2 days a Saturday or Sunday? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

fitf_s5_q4a_p.Description: What time was your child's 1st food/drink?

fitf_s5_q4ai_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q4b_p.Description: What time was your child's last food/drink?

fitf_s5_q4bi_p.Description: Is this normal? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = Don't Know

fitf_s5_q6_p.Description: Does your child eat or drink after dinner? | 1 = They usually have something after dinner.; 2 = They sometimes have something after dinner.; 3 = They almost never have anything after dinner.

Levels.1: They usually have something after dinner.
Levels.2: They sometimes have something after dinner.
Levels.3: They almost never have anything after dinner.
